downloadDescription: Universal Inventory desktop application part of the IAM 2018 release
detailsSection: Desktop application that gathers inventory raw data and standardizes it to get a single view of the Customer's scanned IT infrastructure. This uniquely valuable data can then be used to deliver a variety of valuable insights to the customer, ranging from cybersecurity basics through infrastructure optimization to licensing efficiency.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Have a service account available that can be used to run the Universal Inventory service
• Have a SQL Server 2014 or later, Express Edition or higher database server available
• Have a folder available where Universal Inventory can store Log and Project files
• Have an URL and port available where the Universal Inventory service can be published
installInstructionSection: Download the IAM 2018 User Guide for detailed instructions on how to use the Universal Inventory app at http://AKA.MS/SAMIAM.
